alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 7:06PM CDT until June 15 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Western Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 706 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southeast of Hydro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hinton, Geary, Hydro, Calumet, Bridgeport, and Cedar Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail, damaging wind, and continuous cloud to ground lightning are occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area.
